hero.title: Hi, I'm Olin.
hero.subtitle: I'm a German-American web developer living and working in Cologne, Germany.
hero.tagline: I write full-stack code for web-apps and games.

about.heading: I bring a unique perspective to application design through my background in museums and games.

cards.card-1: I specialize in creating intuitive user experiences. I have experience with mobile, web and desktop development, and have a history of projects ranging from museum exhibitions to security system management and mobile games.
cards.card-2:
My tech stack includes HTML/CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and Apache Flex/ActionScript. I'm also familiar with React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

I'm a native English and German speaker.
cards.card-3:
Moving pixels is my occupation, but there's more to what drives me.

In my leisure time, I like jogging, discovering new locations and sampling different cuisines, listening to podcasts, and playing board games.

skills.heading: Skills and Proficiencies
skills.subheading: I have over %% years of professional software development experience.
